name: Hem Dazon (V)
Lore: 'Male scout from Cona. As with many Arconas, Hem has succumbed to the power of salt, and addiction indicated by his gold eye color.',
Text: 'During your deploy phase, may stack ''salt'' (a card from hand) face down under Hem. Your total battle destiny here is +1 for each ''salt'' card. During your control phase (or if Hem lost), may place all ''salt'' cards in your Used Pile.',
